Artigo: Monitor do Fogo
Forest 4.0: Digitalization of forest using the Internet of Things (IoT)
Citação: The previous system that has been implemented till now, is having some limitations in terms of connectivity, detecting the fire at the edge devices, and power consumption problem for the sensor node. To overcome, the architecture proposed in Fig. 5. is feasible to enhance the short-term estimation of forest fire risks and detection of the beginning of fire incidents in the forest using LoRa communication and edge computing-based gateway. An edge gateway is based on edge computing where the analytics are embed ded in it for calculating the probability of existing forest fire risks and the probability of fire outbreak in the forest area.

Artigo: INCÊNDIOS FLORESTAIS ATENDIDOS PELA KLABIN DO PARANÁ NO PERÍODO DE 1965 A 2009
Citação: De acordo com Soares (2009), para o estabelecimento de uma política adequada de prevenção de incêndios é necessário conhecer as estatísticas referentes aos mesmos. A falta dessas informações pode levar a um dos seguintes extremos: gastos acima do potencial de danos ou gastos pequenos, colocando em risco a sobrevivência da floresta, bem como de todo ecossistema associado.

Citação: Our work is based on the measurement of real data from sensors (temperature, humidity, light and smoke) and a pre- diction of fire using classification techniques of Data Min- ing at the member node level, discarding normal values and transmitting only abnormal values to the cluster-head. This process reduces the number of exchange messages, removes redundancy, improves the system speed and decreases the potential network traffic, extends network life-time and makes early fire detection possible
